snippet: Julia Gillard ordered a nationwide investigation into allegations of abuse of children in state and religious institutions and community groups after a string of accusations.
abstract: Australian Prime Min Julia Gillard orders nationwide investigation into allegations of sexual abuse of children in state and religious institutions and community groups after string of accusations against priests and claims of cover-up by Roman Catholic Church.
lead_paragraph: Julia Gillard ordered a nationwide investigation into allegations of abuse of children in state and religious institutions and community groups after a string of accusations.

headline.main: Australian Prime Minister Orders Sexual Abuse Investigation
headline.print_headline: Prime Minister Orders Sexual Abuse Investigation
